data.convo: What do you think of the new television channel ? Aren't the programs awful ? I quite agree with you . They are terrible . They are complete waste of time , but my wife disagrees with me . Actually , what bothers me is the violence . There are far too many detective and police shows . I couldn't agree with you more . There aren't enough educational programs , and even the news shows are not well done . You are absolutely right . They are too brief . They don't tell you anything .
